title: TWiT 1011: The Year in Review - A Look at the Top Stories of 2024
description: What's behind the tech industry's mass layoffs in 2024? : NPR Rabbit R1 AI Assistant: Price, Specs, Release Date | WIRED Stealing everything you've ever typed or viewed on your own Windows PC is now possible with two lines of code — inside the Copilot+ Recall disaster. Microsoft delays Recall after security concerns, and asks Windows Insiders for help The Qualcomm Snapdragon X Architecture Deep Dive: Getting To Know Oryon and Adreno X1 Elon Musk: First Human Receives Neuralink Brain Chip Apple hit with €1.8bn fine for breaking EU law over music streaming Bluesky emerges The hidden high cost of return-to-office mandates Apple's Car Was Doomed by Its Lofty Ambitions to Outdo Tesla SpaceX pulls off unprecedented feat, grabs descending rocket with mechanical arms U.S. versus Apple: A first reaction Google Says It Won't Force Gemini on Partners in Antitrust Remedy Proposal U.S. Accuses Chinese Hackers of Targeting Critical Infrastructure in America U.S. Agency Warns Employees About Phone Use Amid Ongoing China Hack AT&T says criminals stole phone records of 'nearly all' customers in new data breach National Public Data confirms breach exposing Social Security numbers Schools Want to Ban Phones. Parents Say No. New York passes legislation that would ban 'addictive' social media algorithms for kids GPT-4o (omni) + new "Her"-style AI assistant (it's nuts) Google emissions jump nearly 50% over five years as AI use surges Trump proposes strategic national crypto stockpile at Bitcoin Conference Ten additional US states join DOJ antitrust lawsuit looking to break up Live Nation and TicketmasterThe Internet Archive just lost its appeal over ebook lending Hezbollah Pagers Explode in Apparent Attack Across Lebanon OpenAI raises $6.6 billion in largest VC round ever Painting by A.I.-Powered Robot Sells for $1.1 Million Netflix's Live Mike Tyson Vs. Jake Paul Fight Battling Sound & Streaming Glitches In Lead-Up To Main Event Infowars Sale to The Onion Rejected by Federal Bankruptcy Judge Supreme Court agrees to hear challenge to TikTok ban So You Want to Solve the NJ Drone Mystery? Our Expert Has Some Ideas Beeper's push for iMessage on Android is really over The Quiet Death of Ello's Big Dreams Japan finally ends mandatory form submission on floppy disks We'll Miss You: Pioneering instant messaging program ICQ is finally shutting down after nearly 30 years Spotify is going to break every Car Thing gadget it ever sold Game Informer to Shut Down After 33 Years In Memoriam Host: Leo Laporte Guests: Fr. Robert Ballecer, SJ, Richard Campbell, and Mikah Sargent Download or subscribe to This Week in Tech at https://twit.tv/shows/this-week-in-tech Get episodes ad-free with Club TWiT at https://twit.tv/clubtwit Sponsor: bitwarden.com/twit
author: TWiT
excerpt: What's behind the tech industry's mass layoffs in 2024?

Our Expert Has Some Ideas Supreme Court agrees to hear challenge to TikTok ban Google Says It Won't Force Gemini on Partners in Antitrust Remedy Proposal Spotify is going to break every Car Thing gadget it ever sold - The Verge The Quiet Death of Ello's Big Dreams - Waxy.org Japan finally ends mandatory form submission on floppy disks • The Register Beeper’s push for iMessage on Android is really over - The Verge We'll Miss You: Pioneering instant messaging program ICQ is finally shutting down after nearly 30 years | PC Gamer Game Informer to Shut Down After 33 Years - IGN NASA will shut down NASA TV on cable to focus on NASA+ End of the Road: An AnandTech Farewell Microsoft Is Discontinuing HoloLens 2 As Production Ends David Kahn, Leading Historian of Codes and Code Breaking, Dies at 93 - The New York Times Robert "Bob" G. Heil - Kurrus Funeral Home in Belleville, Illinois Vernor Vinge (1944-2024) - File 770 Daniel Kahneman, Who Plumbed the Psychology of Economics, Dies at 90 - The New York Times Mahbod Moghadam, who rose to fame as the co-founder of Genius, has died | TechCrunch Peter Higgs, physicist who proposed Higgs boson, dies aged 94 | Peter Higgs | The Guardian Robert Dennard, IBM Inventor Whose Chip Changed Computing, Dies at 91 - The New York Times Kabosu, Shiba Inu dog who inspired ‘Doge’ meme, dies at 18 - The Washington Post C. Gordon Bell, Creator of a Personal Computer Prototype, Dies at 89 - The New York Times Lynn Conway, a true pioneer, passes away at 86 Former YouTube CEO Susan Wojcicki dies after 2 years with lung cancer - The Washington Post Ward Christensen, BBS inventor and architect of our online age, dies at age 78 In Memoriam: Thomas E. Kurtz, 1928–2024
html:
• What's behind the tech industry's mass layoffs in 2024? : NPR
  • Rabbit R1 AI Assistant: Price, Specs, Release Date | WIRED
  • Stealing everything you’ve ever typed or viewed on your own Windows 
  • PC is now possible with two lines of code — inside the Copilot+ Recall disaster.
  • Microsoft delays Recall after security concerns, and asks Windows Insiders for help
  • The Qualcomm Snapdragon X Architecture Deep Dive: Getting To Know Oryon and Adreno X1

  • U.S. Accuses Chinese Hackers of Targeting Critical Infrastructure in America
  • U.S. Agency Warns Employees About Phone Use Amid Ongoing China Hack
  • AT&T says criminals stole phone records of 'nearly all' customers in new data breach
  • National Public Data confirms breach exposing Social Security numbers
  • Schools Want to Ban Phones. Parents Say No.
  • New York passes legislation that would ban 'addictive' social media algorithms for kids
  • GPT-4o (omni) + new "Her"-style AI assistant (it's nuts)
  • Google emissions jump nearly 50% over five years as AI use surges
  • Trump proposes strategic national crypto stockpile at Bitcoin Conference
  • Ten additional US states join DOJ antitrust lawsuit looking to break up Live Nation and TicketmasterThe Internet Archive just lost its appeal over ebook lending
  • Hezbollah Pagers Explode in Apparent Attack Across Lebanon
  • OpenAI raises $6.6 billion in largest VC round ever
  • Painting by A.I.-Powered Robot Sells for $1.1 Million
  • Netflix’s Live Mike Tyson Vs. Jake Paul Fight Battling Sound & Streaming Glitches In Lead-Up To Main Event
  • Infowars Sale to The Onion Rejected by Federal Bankruptcy Judge
  • Supreme Court agrees to hear challenge to TikTok ban
  • So You Want to Solve the NJ Drone Mystery? Our Expert Has Some Ideas
  • Beeper’s push for iMessage on Android is really over
  • The Quiet Death of Ello's Big Dreams
  • Japan finally ends mandatory form submission on floppy disks
  • We'll Miss You: Pioneering instant messaging program ICQ is finally shutting down after nearly 30 years
  • Spotify is going to break every Car Thing gadget it ever sold
  • Game Informer to Shut Down After 33 Years
  • In Memoriam
